title: Bug 9654 - Modify Parameters: Dialog details
description: Bug 9654 - Modify Parameters: The dialog details show duplicated name validation could be performed on the first page. The first and second columns could be merged.
OB: a. The buttons are too small. b. When the dialog comes up, no table entry is selected. However, both move buttons are enabled. e. When changing a parameter name to something very long, the preview is cut off. g. The dialog comes up huge for methods with many parameters.
EB: The buttons should be of appropriate size. The dialog should come up with a table entry selected by default. Only the relevant move button should be enabled. The preview should display the entire parameter name. The dialog should resize according to the number of parameters.
SR: 1. Open the 'Modify Parameters' dialog. 2. Try changing a parameter name to a very long name. Observe if the preview is truncated. 3. Open the 'Modify Parameters' dialog for a method with many parameters. Observe if the dialog size is appropriate.
